title: 求救啊，大神帮忙看看什么错误
author: werys
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad. I'll do better next time, I promise!

replies.author: fihgus
replies.txt_content: 更新你的forge, 然后下载 forge兼容的 optifine.

replies.author: Silver_Leaf
replies.txt_content: MOD太多了，服务器承受不住，崩了- -
